Description: COLLECTING POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR OUR UPCOMING PROJECTS IN IRAQ!Responsibilities• Plan and implement the plant maintenance programs with an emphasis on preventive / predictive maintenance. • Analyze and improve key maintenance parameters such as asset utilization, downtime, maintenance cost, compliance with the schedules etc. • Conduct inspection and ensure that there are no breakdowns or disruptions in the production processes. • Plan maintenance and service activities in a way that the process of production does not get affected. • Ensure that SAP is updated for tracking work orders, utilization of spare parts on respective machines, inventory of spare parts, tool record etc. • Ensure that a record of all service, maintenance and refurbishing works carried out on the machinery is available. • Prepares reports, analyzes data, and makes recommendations for improving plant operations and solving maintenance related problems.  • Maintain the Preventative Maintenance system.
